eeta amatharawa solos pirikara da sesu pirikara washayen siwuru, andana, watapath, gamanmalu aadi noyek de da puja kala hakiyi.solos pirikarata ayath wanne thanipata siwura,depata siwura, andanaya, patiya, perahankadaya, dali pihiya,pathraya, idikatu nul,haramitiya, watapatha, kudaya, sereppu, beheth warga, paduru kotta athirili, indulkadaya ha pathkadayayi.winayanukula atapirikarak sakasimata redi yara 23k pamana awashyayi.

eeta amatharawa balapradeshaye samaja, aagamika ha sanskruthika uthsawa awasthawaladi pradeshaye janathawata apage uparima dayakathwaya labadima thulin janathawath apath athara mana sanhidiyawak godanagi thibenawa.
